transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+3% Ally Team Resilience
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+3% Ally Team Resilience
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Justice's Quad Strike
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to gain a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. The barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\nTargets all enemies and deals additional damage proportional to Defense

description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000042_1_1]</color> chance to gain a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000042_1_1] turn(s)</color>. The barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Courageous Protection
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Increases <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color> of all allies except the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: Increases <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color> of all allies except the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000042_2_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Loving Justice Dive
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to grant <color=#28d9ed>Increased Resilience</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Invulnerability</color> to each ally for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000042_3_1]</color> chance to grant <color=#28d9ed>Increased Resilience</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Invulnerability</color> to each ally for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000042_3_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, reduces the skill cooldowns of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>1 turns</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage increases proportionally to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, reduces the skill cooldowns of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000042_chain_1_1] turns</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage increases proportionally to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
